Name: Vipul Singh
Title: Must Visit in Leh
Review: One must visit this museum for extra traditional experience. It is located just behind the market and have lots of artifacts and some could be relics also.

Name: SaddviAndalwala
Title: Huge variety of handloom goods
Review: The Kashmiri handloom industry seemed to have displayed all its products in the Textile Museum of Ladakh. The beautiful Persian and Kashmiri carpets and cardigans caught my special attention.
